column5: We went for a rainbow fish last weekend; it was a nice day and a good ride in. Since neither mine or Joey's sled is a dedicated two-up, we chose to pull the third guy on a GT, a kids GT. We split task as the trail was 10kms long. Yes, that's a long ride on a GT, but it was actually quite enjoyable.      Of course we found a few nasty slush holes. Took us a couple hours to be free.        Two fish, enough to make it a successful trip.

10 km on a GT, that's pretty funny. Off topic, but those things were well made. I still have a larger size GT. We've had 2 guys on the BR and a third guy towed on the GT into back lakes. Towed a GT behind a boat too.  Looks like a beauty day out there (aside from the slush), short sleeves, sun and a couple nice bows. Were the fish up top, just under the ice?
Talk about being resourceful! That's great, looks like you guys had a good time too.

10 km on a GT, that's pretty funny. Off topic, but those things were well made. I still have a larger size GT. We've had 2 guys on the BR and a third guy towed on the GT into back lakes. Towed a GT behind a boat too.  Looks like a beauty day out there (aside from the slush), short sleeves, sun and a couple nice bows. Were the fish up top, just under the ice? It is funny. haha, We had a good laugh at ourselves. The ride back wasn't as 'fun', our arses were quite sore.  We were tight to shore off a steep drop, maybe 8fow is where they were both caught.
looks like  fun day! numb bum....  brings back the days of 8 hour bike rides
That picture made me cry laughing…absolutely AWESOME! Holy man, 10ks on a GT!  Thanks for posting.
The GT... the memories.  What a kickarse ride to take on one of those.  Great day spent!
That picture made me cry laughing…absolutely AWESOME! Holy man, 10ks on a GT!  Thanks for posting. haha, agreed! He's smiling like a giant kid haha
Haha. Man you guys are hardcore. Out there again on the slush eh? The GT ride looks fun and those are some nice bows. Looks like another great day out.
Another classic winter adventure.  Too bad they weren't cooperative yesterday
I think my prostate would explode after being on a GT for 10Km!!  But it sure look fun!  Your a slush magnet this winter!.. Not sure what else to say about that..
It took you 2 hours to get out of the slush?  Nice fish boys, you deserved them!

Ya, it was really bad and two of us didn't have waterproof boots...so it was a slow and deliberate escape. Pack a trail ahead of the machine for 30 minutes, move 15 feet and do it all over again. I'm getting tired just thinking about it.
